head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ In my annual report I have drawn the attention of my minister to the very great inconvenience I suffer from the determination of all your botanic collections being carried out in Victori...

div.p: Letter press copy book 2, pp. 105-6, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.

In my annual report I have drawn the attention of my minister to the very great inconvenience I suffer from the determination of all your botanic collections being carried out in Victoria particularly on account of the reports on them not being printed at their Government printing office but are scattered through the pages of various periodicals and then not always printed in Australia. I think you will allow that I am not asking too much when requesting to be furnished with copies of all the botanic reports on the new Guinea flora or than such may be printed in Melbourne (while the dated [...] are carried out there) so that I may be able to obtain them. At the present time I should probably only be making more synonyms by naming plants from New Guinea seeing I am without the literature on the subject. yet I am frequently referred to on the nomenclature of the New Guinea plant life.
